settings.descriptionText: Vinaya Journal is your personal Local AI-powered journaling companion, made for data privacy while using AI.
settings.copyrightText1: Open Source , Free to use and contribute.
settings.copyrightText2: You can modify the code and use it for your own purposes but please don't sell it.
settings.copyrightText3: Also please don't use it for any illegal purposes.
settings.copyrightText4: And also please give credits to all contributors if you use it somewhere else because our good friends are working hard to make this project better.

quotes: Peace comes from within. Do not seek it without.
Each morning we are born again. What we do today is what matters most.
The mind is everything. What you think you become.
Nothing can harm you as much as your own thoughts unguarded.
Silence the angry man with love. Silence the ill-natured man with kindness.
Just as a snake sheds its skin, we must shed our past over and over again.
Happiness never decreases by being shared.
Your purpose in life is to find your purpose and give your whole heart and soul to it.
If anything is worth doing, do it with all your heart.
Be where you are; otherwise you will miss your life.
Every morning we are born again. What we do today matters most.
The trouble is, you think you have time.
Believe nothing, no matter where you read it or who has said it, unless it agrees with your own reason.
Three things cannot be long hidden: the sun, the moon, and the truth.

loading.title: Starting Vinaya
loading.subtitle: Please wait while we prepare your journaling environment
loading.refreshHint: Press Ctrl+R to refresh the page for real-time service status updates
loading.pythonLoadingHint: If the model is loading, you can proceed and refresh the app later with Ctrl+R
loading.pythonNote: Note: (May take a few minutes) If Python service is still loading, you can proceed to the app and refresh (Ctrl+R) when it's ready.
loading.pythonNoteShort: Note: Python service may take a few moments to load. You can press Ctrl+R to refresh the page for real-time updates.
